00056 #define INDRI_TAGGEDTEXTPARSER_HPP

00060 #include <string.h>
00061 #include <string>
00062 #include <vector>
00063 #include <map>
00064 #include "indri/HashTable.hpp"

00066 #include "indri/IndriParser.hpp"
00067 #include "indri/Buffer.hpp"
00068 #include "lemur/string-set.h"
00069 
00070 #define MAX_DOCNO_LENGTH 128
00071 #define PARSER_MAX_BUF_SIZE 1024
00072 
00073 class StringHash {
00074 public:
00075   int operator() (const std::string key) const {
00076     int hash = 0;
00077     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < key.length(); i++)
00078       hash += (unsigned char)key[i];
00079     return hash;
00080   }
00081 };
00082 
00083 class StringComparator {
00084 public:
00085   int operator() (const std::string one, const std::string two) const {
00086     return one.compare(two);
00087   }
00088 };
00089 
00090 class TaggedTextParser : public indri::Parser {
00091 public:
00092   TaggedTextParser();
00093   ~TaggedTextParser();
00094   
00095   void setTags( const std::vector<std::string>& include,
00096                 const std::vector<std::string>& exclude,
00097                 const std::vector<std::string>& index,
00098                 const std::vector<std::string>& metadata, 
00099                 const std::map<std::string,std::string>& conflations );
00100 
00101   ParsedDocument* parse( UnparsedDocument* document );
00102 
00103   void handle( UnparsedDocument* document );
00104   void setHandler( ObjectHandler<ParsedDocument>& h );
00105 
00106 protected:
00107   typedef HashTable<std::string, std::string, StringHash, StringComparator> StrHashTable;
00108 
00109   virtual void handleToken(char *token, int type, long pos);
00110   virtual void initialize( UnparsedDocument* unparsed, ParsedDocument* parsed );
00111   virtual void cleanup( UnparsedDocument* unparsed, ParsedDocument* parsed );
00112 
00113   void addTag(const char *s, const char* c, int pos) { tl->addTag(s, c, pos); }
00114   void endTag(const char *s, const char* c, int pos) { tl->endTag(s, c, pos); }
00115 
00116   void addMetadataTag(const char* s, const char* c, int pos) { _metaList->addTag(s, c, pos); }
00117   void endMetadataTag(const char* s, const char* c, int pos) { _metaList->endTag(s, c, pos); }
00118 
00119   // tag list
00120   TagList* tl;
00121   TagList* _metaList;
00122   Buffer _termBuffer;
00123 
00124   void writeToken(char *token);
00125 
00126   struct tag_properties {
00127     const char* name;
00128     const char* conflation;
00129     bool index;
00130     bool exclude;
00131     bool include;
00132     bool metadata;
00133   };
00134   tag_properties* _findTag(const char* name);
00135   tag_properties* _buildTag( const std::string& name, const std::map<std::string,std::string>& conflations );
00136   HashTable<const char*, tag_properties*> _tagTable;
00137   void handleTag(char* token, long pos);
00138 
00139   const tag_properties* _startExcludeRegion;
00140   const tag_properties* _startIncludeRegion;
00141   
00142   bool _exclude;
00143   bool _include;
00144   bool _defaultInclude;
00145   
00146 private:
00147   ObjectHandler<ParsedDocument>* _handler;
00148   ParsedDocument _document;
00149 
00150   void doParse();
00151   void writeToken(char *token, int start, int end);
00152   char start_tag[PARSER_MAX_BUF_SIZE];
00153   char end_tag[PARSER_MAX_BUF_SIZE];
00154 };

00156 namespace TaggedTextTokenType {
00157   const int tag = 1;
00158   const int upword = 2;
00159   const int word = 3;
00160   const int contraction = 4;
00161   const int acronym = 5;
00162   const int acronym2 = 6;
00163   const int unknown = 7;
00164 };
